location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to Mr Babcock, Muscat

mods.abstract: The letter concerns legal proceedings that may be brought by Mr Babcock against Goolaub Anendass, the Company's Agent at Muscat, to recover his property. It states that the Imam of Muscat has been informed that the agent is not to be permitted to use his position to interfere with, or obstruct any proceedings he may decide to institute.
